scripts.clear:client: cd client && rm -rf dist && rm -rf cache
scripts.clear:server: cd server && rm -rf dist && rm -rf cache
scripts.clear: npm run clear:client && npm run clear:server
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run clear && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:server
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
